Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The pandemic has caused an upheaval in the daily financial challenges for people. With the rise in the cost of living households are struggling to keep up with the expenses. Recent data has revealed that Queenslanders are among the worst affected while calls for an increase in job seeker payment and governmental aid are becoming more prominent. Concerns for another interest rate hike remain and households are bracing themselves for another financial burden. Nonetheless there is hope as official inflation figures show a declined price growth indicating the possibility that inflation has peaked.
